SEARCH
Module com.example.cab302a1
Package com.example.cab302a1.result

Class QuizResultController

java.lang.Object
com.example.cab302a1.result.QuizResultController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class QuizResultController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controller class for the Quiz Result page. Handles display of quiz results and provides integration points for team members. This controller provides functionality for: - Displaying quiz scores and results - Navigation to answer review page - Navigation back to home page - Team integration interfaces for easy connection
Version:
1.0
Author:
CAB302 Assignment Team

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL location, ResourceBundle resources)
      Called to initialize the controller after its root element has been completely processed. Sets up default configuration and accessibility features.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      location - The location used to resolve relative paths for the root object
      resources - The resources used to localize the root object

    • setQuizResult

      public void setQuizResult(QuizResultData quizResultData)
      Sets the quiz result data and updates the display. This is the main integration point for team members.
      Parameters:
      quizResultData - The quiz result data to display

    • setQuizResultFromDatabase

      public void setQuizResultFromDatabase(int quizId, int userId) throws QuizResultService.QuizResultException
      Sets quiz result data by fetching from database using AttemptDao.getScore(). This method uses the quiz_id and user_id to fetch the actual score from database.
      Parameters:
      quizId - The ID of the quiz
      userId - The ID of the user
      Throws:
      QuizResultService.QuizResultException - if data cannot be fetched from database

    • setQuizResultFromDatabaseForCurrentUser

      public void setQuizResultFromDatabaseForCurrentUser(int quizId) throws QuizResultService.QuizResultException
      Sets quiz result data for the currently logged-in user. Uses Session.getCurrentUser() to get the current user ID.
      Parameters:
      quizId - The ID of the quiz
      Throws:
      QuizResultService.QuizResultException - if no user is logged in or data cannot be fetched

    • showQuizResultFromDatabase

      public static void showQuizResultFromDatabase(javafx.stage.Stage stage, int quizId, int userId) throws IOException, QuizResultService.QuizResultException
      Static method for showing quiz results directly from database. Team members can use this method to navigate from their quiz completion logic.
      Parameters:
      stage - The current stage
      quizId - The ID of the quiz
      userId - The ID of the user
      Throws:
      IOException - if the quiz result FXML cannot be loaded
      QuizResultService.QuizResultException - if database data cannot be fetched

    • showQuizResultFromDatabaseForCurrentUser

      public static void showQuizResultFromDatabaseForCurrentUser(javafx.stage.Stage stage, int quizId) throws IOException, QuizResultService.QuizResultException
      Static method for showing quiz results for the current user from database.
      Parameters:
      stage - The current stage
      quizId - The ID of the quiz
      Throws:
      IOException - if the quiz result FXML cannot be loaded
      QuizResultService.QuizResultException - if database data cannot be fetched

    • setAnswerReviewHandler

      public void setAnswerReviewHandler(QuizResultController.AnswerReviewHandler handler)
      Sets the answer review handler for team integration. Team members implementing answer review should call this method.
      Parameters:
      handler - The answer review handler implementation

    • setHomeNavigationHandler

      public void setHomeNavigationHandler(QuizResultController.HomeNavigationHandler handler)
      Sets the home navigation handler for team integration. Team members can customize home navigation by calling this method.
      Parameters:
      handler - The home navigation handler implementation

    • showQuizResult

      public static void showQuizResult(javafx.stage.Stage stage, QuizResultData quizResultData) throws IOException
      Static method for easy scene navigation to quiz result page. Team members can use this method to navigate from their quiz completion logic.
      Parameters:
      stage - The current stage
      quizResultData - The quiz result data to display
      Throws:
      IOException - if the quiz result FXML cannot be loaded

    • showQuizResult

      public static void showQuizResult(javafx.stage.Stage stage, int correctAnswers, int totalQuestions) throws IOException
      Convenience method for showing quiz results with basic score data. Useful for quick integration during development.
      Parameters:
      stage - The current stage
      correctAnswers - Number of correct answers
      totalQuestions - Total number of questions
      Throws:
      IOException - if the quiz result page cannot be loaded

    • getCurrentQuizResult

      public QuizResultData getCurrentQuizResult()
      Gets the current quiz result data. Useful for team members who need access to the data.
      Returns:
      The current quiz result data, or null if not set

    • hasAnswerReviewHandler

      public boolean hasAnswerReviewHandler()
      Checks if answer review handler is registered. Useful for conditional UI behavior.
      Returns:
      true if answer review handler is set

    • hasHomeNavigationHandler

      public boolean hasHomeNavigationHandler()
      Checks if home navigation handler is registered. Useful for conditional UI behavior.
      Returns:
      true if home navigation handler is set
